LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Militia.label: Miho Trooper Armor
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Militia.description: It is a tactical plate armor. It is sturdy and above all it reduces the reload speed.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Militia_Tan.label: Miho Trooper Armor (tan)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Militia_Tan.descript: It is a tactical plate armor. It is sturdy and above all it reduces the reload speed.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_MilitiaMedic.label: Miho Medic Armor
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_MilitiaMedic.descrip: It is a tactical plate armor. A module enables the wearer to use healing. If they already know how to use it, the modules provides a second charge.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_MilitiaVest.label: Miho Tactical Vest
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_MilitiaVest.descript: It is a tactical vest. It has some protection and above all it reduces the reload speed.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Powered.label: Miho Exoskeleton Heavy Armor
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Powered.description: An exoskeleton specialized for combat. Various additional parts can be installed.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_PoweredMechanitor.de: An exoskeleton with build-in mechanitor equipment. Its high-tech components make it more impact resistant than a typical exoskeleton.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_PoweredWorker.label: Miho Exoskeleton
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_PoweredWorker.descri: An exoskeleton specialized for working. It doesn't protect the wearer, but even fragile Miho can easyly to carry heavy loads.
